translation.en: One, two, three!
♪ Take off ♪ ♪ Last stop ♪
♪ Countdown till we blast open the top ♪
translation.ja: 成功へのカウントダウン

translation.en: ♪ Face first ♪ ♪ Full charge ♪
translation.ja: 頭から飛び込む　充電はフル

translation.en: ♪ Electric hammer to the heart ♪
♪ Clocks move faster ♪
♪ 'Cause it's all we're after now ♪
translation.ja: 俺らは今 それを追う

translation.en: ♪ Won't stop climbing ♪
♪ 'Cause this is our time, yeah ♪
translation.ja: 今は俺らの時代なんだ

translation.en: ♪ When all the days felt black and white ♪
♪ Those were the best shades of my life ♪
translation.ja: あれが俺の人生で 　　最良の日々だった

translation.en: ♪ Don't look down ♪
♪ 'Cause we're still rising ♪
♪ Up right now ♪
♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪ ♪ We'll still fly ♪
translation.ja: もし地に落ちても 　　　　また飛ぶんだ

translation.en: ♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.ja: 永遠に生きるつもりで 　　　　　　　　夢を見て

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.ja: 今しかないつもりで生きる

translation.en: ♪ We ain't searching for tomorrow ♪
translation.ja: 明日なんて どうでもいい

translation.en: ♪ Tomorrow ♪
♪ 'Cause we got all we need today ♪
translation.ja: 今日要るものは全部ある

translation.en: ♪ Today ♪
♪ Living on a feeling ♪
♪ That's been running through our veins ♪
translation.ja: それだけを頼りに生きる

translation.en: ♪ We're the revolution ♪
♪ That's been singing in the rain ♪
translation.ja: 雨の中でも歌い続ける

translation.en: ♪ Don't look down ♪
♪ 'Cause we're still rising up right now ♪
translation.ja: 俺らは今 上がってる最中だ

translation.en: ♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪
translation.ja: もしも 地に落ちてもまた飛ぶんだ

translation.en: ♪ We'll still fly ♪
translation.ja: 地に落ちてもまた飛ぶんだ

translation.en: ♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.ja: 永遠に生きるつもりで 　　　　　　　　夢を見て

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.ja: 今しかないつもりで生きる

translation.en: ♪ It's now or never ♪
♪ Now or never ♪
- Whoo! Excellent! - Sounds great, guys!
translation.ja: キマってた いい曲だ

translation.en: - Yeah! -
Thank you! We're Sunset Curve!
Too bad we wasted the tightest we've played on sound check!
Wait until tonight, man, when this place gets packed with record execs.
translation.ja: 本番はレコード会社の 重役も来る

translation.en: Alex, you were smoking.
translation.ja: アレックス　完璧だ

translation.en: Oh no. I was just warming up. You guys were the ones on fire.
translation.ja: まだまださ みんなはバッチリだね

translation.en: Could you just own your awesomeness for once?
translation.ja: たまには実力を認めろ

translation.en: - All right, I was killing it. -
OK, well, I'm thinking we fuel up before the show. I'm thinking street dogs.
translation.ja: ホットドッグで 腹ごしらえしよう

translation.en: - Ooh! - Yes.
Hey, Bobby, where you going?
I'm good.
Vegetarian. I could never hurt an animal.
You guys are really good.
Thank you.
I see a lot of bands.
Been in a couple myself. I was really feeling it.
translation.ja: 特別なものを感じたわ

translation.en: That's what we do this for. I'm Luke, by the way.
translation.ja: うれしいよ　俺はルーク

translation.en: - Hi, I'm Reggie. - Alex.
Bobby.
Nice meeting you guys.
I'm Rose.
here's our demo.
And a T- shirt. Size beautiful.
translation.ja: それと美人サイズのＴシャツ

translation.en: Thanks.
I'll make sure not to wipe the tables down with this one.
translation.ja: 布巾と間違えないようにする

translation.en: Oh, good call. Whenever they get wet, they just kinda fall apart in your hands.
translation.ja: それがいい 濡れるとボロボロになるから

translation.en: Don't you guys have to go get hot dogs?
Yeah, he had a hamburger for lunch.
translation.ja: こいつは昼に ハンバーガーを食べた

translation.en: - That's what I'm talking about! -
The smell of Sunset Boulevard?
translation.ja: サンセット大通りの匂い？

translation.en: No.
It's what that girl said in there tonight.
translation.ja: 俺らの音楽を聴いた あの子の反応さ

translation.en: About our music, all right? It's like an energy.
translation.ja: 俺らの音楽を聴いた あの子の反応さ 心に響いたんだよ

translation.en: It connects us with people.
They can feel us when we play.
translation.ja: 俺たちを感じてもらえた

translation.en: I want that connection with everybody.
translation.ja: 俺は ああいうのを求めてる

translation.en: Then we're gonna need more T- shirts.
Let's go, boys.
Ladies.
Reggie, wait!
- Oh my God. Reggie! - Oh my God! Hi, it's me!
translation.ja: 待って！ ねえ 私よ

translation.en: Man... I can't wait until we eat someplace
translation.ja: 早く まともな料理を 食べたいよ

translation.en: where the condiments aren't served out of the back of an Oldsmobile.
translation.ja: こういうのじゃなくてさ

translation.en: Hey...
Sorry, I got some pickle juice on your battery cables.
translation.ja: ピクルスの汁を ケーブルに垂らした

translation.en: No problem. It'll help with the rust.
translation.ja: いいさ　サビに効く

translation.en: - That can't... -
OK. What?
This is awesome, you guys. We're playing The Orpheum!
translation.ja: 最高だよ　オルフェウムだぞ

translation.en: I can't even count how many bands have played here and then ended up being huge.
translation.ja: あそこで演奏したバンドの 多くが出世した

translation.en: We're gonna be legends!
Eat up, boys.
'Cause after tonight,  everything changes.
translation.ja: 今夜を境に すべてが変わる

translation.en: That's a new flavor.
Chill, man. Street dogs haven't killed us yet.
translation.ja: 平気さ　死にはしないよ

translation.en: Hey, underachiever.
Hey, disappointment.
translation.ja: あら 期待外れさん

translation.en: OK, I know you don't want me to ask, but have you figured out
translation.ja: イヤな話題だけど 今日はできそう？

translation.en: - what you're gonna do today? - I'll know in the moment.
translation.ja: イヤな話題だけど 今日はできそう？ 分からない

translation.en: Really, Jules? That's all you're giving me?
translation.ja: ウソでしょ？　ジュールズ

translation.en: Mrs. Harrison said this is your last chance.
translation.ja: 最後のチャンスなんだよ

translation.en: I know. I was there.
- - See you at the rally!
Ugh! What is she handing out?
- Hi! - Desperation?
Here you go. My group's performing at the spirit rally tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日の激励会に 私のグループが出るの

translation.en: I'm sure you guys have nothing better to do.
translation.ja: 大した予定はないでしょ？

translation.en: Oh my gosh, Carrie. Thanks!
translation.ja: キャリー　ありがとう

translation.en: Oh my gosh, Flynn. Don't bother coming!
translation.ja: フリンったら 来なくていいのよ

translation.en: Here you go.
Come see Dirty Candy tomorrow.
Nick?
Still?
You know they're gonna get married and have a bunch of unholy babies.
translation.ja: ２人は いずれ 邪悪な子供を持つ

translation.en: Nick's a sweetheart.
You'd actually have to talk to him to know that.
And only one of them has to be a demon to make a demon baby.
translation.ja: 一方が悪魔なら 邪悪な子が生まれる

translation.en: Demon!
There's that smile. Now, let's go prove everybody wrong.
translation.ja: その調子 みんなを驚かせよう

translation.en: Nice job, Nick.
Almost as impressive as your game against Glendale.
translation.ja: グレンデール戦並みに 感心した

translation.en: OK, we have one last performance.
translation.ja: さて― 最後の演奏者はジュリーよ

translation.en: Julie?
translation.ja: 最後の演奏者はジュリーよ

translation.en: Take your time.
I'm sorry.
Is this when we clap?
Watch it, Carrie.
Oh good. You're home.
I was about to go watch your brother's game.
translation.ja: カルロスの応援に行く

translation.en: I've had photo shoots all day. Didn't even get a chance to eat.
translation.ja: 今日は撮影に追われて 食事もできなかった

translation.en: But... I got a phone call today.
Yeah, I figured as much.
Yeah.
- Well, it was my Realtor friend. - Oh, that.
translation.ja: 不動産業者だ そっちね

translation.en: Yeah, and she says if we are serious about selling the house,
translation.ja: 本気で家を売りに出すなら

translation.en: then she wants me to take some pictures for the website.
translation.ja: サイト用の写真を撮れと 言うんだ

translation.en: Which means we have to do a lot of cleaning and get rid of some stuff.
translation.ja: その前に 家の中を片付けないと

translation.en: And maybe you can... tackle Mom's studio?
translation.ja: ママのスタジオを お願いできるか？

translation.en: You're the expert.
You know, your brother and I wouldn't even know where to begin.
translation.ja: パパたちじゃ 何から始めていいやら

translation.en: It's OK, honey. If you're not ready, I--
No.
It's all right.
Maybe I'll try tonight.
Yeah?
Awesome, mija. Thank you. Oh, and don't forget the loft.
translation.ja: よかった 屋根裏も忘れるなよ

translation.en: You know, those old instruments that were there when we moved in?
translation.ja: 引っ越した時からある 古い楽器も―

translation.en: They need a new home.
Mom would like that.
Yeah, she would.
Oh God. I'm gonna be late.
Under the mail.
You're a lifesaver.
I'm so sorry, Mom.
That I haven't been here.
How did we get back here?
- Dad! - Whoa! Hey!
Whoa! Slow down. You look like you've seen a ghost.
translation.ja: 幽霊でも見たような顔だ

translation.en: - I have! - Cool.
Not cool!
Run!
Come on, Flynn.
translation.ja: “緊急事態” 緊急事態だってば　フリン

translation.en: 911 means 911!
translation.ja: 緊急事態だってば　フリン

translation.en: Why aren't you answering me?
- Dad. - Sorry.
Just wanted to make sure you were OK.
You don't believe me, do you?
Honey, of course I do. Mija, I see your mom all the time.
translation.ja: 信じてるよ パパもママを見る

translation.en: This isn't like that.
I know. It's different for all of us.
Dad, you're not listening to me.
I saw something out there.
All right. OK. OK.
I'm listening.
Tell me what you saw. It's just you and me here.
You sound just like Dr. Turner.
Well, maybe seeing Dr. Turner again isn't such a bad idea.
translation.ja: またセラピーを受けるか？

translation.en: Dad!
Can we just drop it?
All right. Dropped.
translation.ja: よし　この話は終わり

translation.en: We good?
Yeah.
Are you still here...
...whatever you are?
I know I saw something. I'm not crazy.
translation.ja: 絶対に見た 私はイカれてない

translation.en: Well, we're all a little crazy.
Oh my God! Please stop screaming!
Who are you, and what are you doing in my mom's studio?
translation.ja: ママのスタジオで何を？

translation.en: Your mom's studio? This is our studio. Trust me, my...
translation.ja: 待てよ ここは俺らのスタジオだ 本当だって このピアノは新品

translation.en: The grand piano is new, and... and... and ...
translation.ja: 本当だって このピアノは新品

translation.en: My couch!
That is definitely not my six- string.
translation.ja: あのギターは知らない

translation.en: Can you give me just one second?
translation.ja: ちょっと待ってもらえる？

translation.en: Just... give me a second. Thank you.
translation.ja: ちょっと待ってもらえる？ 少しだけだから

translation.en: Guys, what is going on? How did she get her stuff in here so fast?
translation.ja: 彼女は どうやって 荷物を運び入れた？

translation.en: Maybe... maybe she's a witch. There's chairs floating on the ceiling.
translation.ja: 魔女なのかも イスを浮かべてる

translation.en: OK, there is no such thing as witches.
You sure? I used to think there was no such thing as ghosts.
translation.ja: 幽霊もいないと思ってたぞ

translation.en: That's fair.
OK, so we're going with witch?
No! We are not going with witch.
She's not a witch. OK, look. She's just scared.
translation.ja: 彼女は おびえてる

translation.en: OK? Let someone
with a softer touch handle this.
Why are you in our studio?
Oh my gosh! How did you do that?
Clearly, you're not understanding... She doesn't get it.
OK, look. We're ghosts, all right?
translation.ja: 説明するよ 僕らは幽霊で ここに戻れて喜んでる

translation.en: We're just three ghosts, and we're really happy to be home.
translation.ja: 僕らは幽霊で ここに戻れて喜んでる

translation.en: So, thank you for the flowers. They really brighten up the room.
translation.ja: 花をどうも スタジオが明るくなった

translation.en: - We're in a band called Sunset Curve. - Tell your friends.
translation.ja: 俺らはサンセット･カーブ バンドさ

translation.en: Last night was supposed to be a really big night for us. It was gonna change our lives.
translation.ja: ゆうべ俺らの人生は 変わるはずだった

translation.en: I'm, uh... I'm pretty sure it did.
This is freaking me out.
- What is that? What are you doing? - It's my phone.
No! Stop talking to them. They aren't real.
translation.ja: 答えちゃダメ イケメンの幽霊なんていない

translation.en: - There's no such thing as cute ghosts. - Oh, think we're cute?
translation.ja: イケメンの幽霊なんていない イケメンだって

translation.en: - - Who you calling?
I'm Googling Sunset Swerve.
translation.ja: 調べてる　サンセット…

translation.en: Sunset Curve!
Whoa.
There is a Sunset Curve.
You did die.
But not last night.
Twenty- five years ago?
What? No. No, no, no. Th- Th- That's impossible.
translation.ja: まさか　ウソだ ありえない

translation.en: After we floated out of the ambulance, all we did was go to that weird, dark room where Alex cried.
translation.ja: 体が浮いたあと 暗い部屋でこいつが泣いて…

translation.en: Well... I don't think...
I think we were all pretty upset. OK.
translation.ja: みんな動揺はしてたよな

translation.en: But that was just for like an hour.
We just showed up here.
Look. I'm just telling you what my phone says.
translation.ja: だけど そう書いてある

translation.en: See? You died in 1995.
When you were 17.
It's now 2020.
So, this is the future?
Wait. So... So, it has been 25 years.
I have been crying for 25 years? How is that possible?
translation.ja: 僕は25年間 泣き続けてた？ あり得ないよ

translation.en: - Well, you're a very emotional person. - I am not!
translation.ja: 感情的だろ 違うね

translation.en: Thought you were afraid to come out here.
You talking to your ghost friend? How does he look? Is he hideous?
- He can see you. - No, he can't.
translation.ja: お前だな 違う　見えてない

translation.en: What?
Uh... What do you want?
A normal sister, for starters. Stop being weird and come eat.
translation.ja: 普通にできないの？ 夕食だってさ

translation.en: He couldn't see you.
Yeah. I mean, that's...
- usually how ghosts work. - Hmm.
Look, I'm very sorry for what happened to you guys, but this isn't your studio anymore.
translation.ja: 死んだのは気の毒だけど ここにいられちゃ困る

translation.en: You have to leave.
But wait. We...
- We didn't get your name. - It's Julie.
Cool.  I- I'm Luke,
by... by the way.
translation.ja: それから こいつは…

translation.en: - And this is-- - Reggie. I'm Reggie.
translation.ja: それから こいつは… レジー

translation.en: - Hey. - And...
Alex. How's it going?
OK?
Julie seems nice.
Did you miss the part where she kicked us out, or...
Yes. OK.
There we go!
OK.
- Let's do this. - Let's do it.
Your turn, Carlos.
Thank you for our leftovers and the power of the mighty microwave.
translation.ja: 残り物と電子レンジに 感謝します

translation.en: - Amen. - Amen.
translation.ja: アーメン アーメン

translation.en: So...
Carlos tells me he found you in the studio.
translation.ja: スタジオに いたんだって？

translation.en: She was out there talking to herself.
I was rehearsing for a play.
Hello, hello!
Oh, busted!
Yeah, we're in here. Quick!
Spaghetti. Again?
Yeah.
That's too bad.
I brought you my pasteles and arroz con pollo.
translation.ja: チキンの炊き込みご飯を 持ってきたのに

translation.en: - Yum. - Mm!
Thanks, tia. It smells great.
translation.ja: おばさん　ありがとう

translation.en: You can have it tomorrow.
I can't let you have leftovers every night.
translation.ja: 残り物ばかり 食べさせられないわ

translation.en: My sister would kill me, may she rest in peace.
translation.ja: 死んだ妹に怒られちゃう

translation.en: Oh... I see things here are going better?
Actually...
...Julie has been cleaning out mom's studio.
translation.ja: ジュリーがスタジオの整理を

translation.en: Hopefully, we can get the house on the market and some offers soon.
translation.ja: この家を売りに出すんだ

translation.en: Well, I like the sound of that.
Moving from here is only gonna help you move on.
You've got to rip that Band- Aid off and get the pain over with.
translation.ja: 絆創膏(ばんそうこう)をはがして 痛みを終わらせるの

translation.en: That's me. Ripping off the Band- Aid.
translation.ja: どう？　絆創膏をはがしたの

translation.en: There's my brave girl.
Hey, Julie, I really like what you guys did with the place.
translation.ja: 今のスタジオ いい感じだよ

translation.en: - You shouldn't be here. -
Oh, I'm just here to help, mija.
Oh... I think that's our cue to leave.
I mean, you should be at Pilates.
translation.ja: ピラティスの日でしょ？

translation.en: - Thanks for bringing us food. - Oh.
translation.ja: 本当に ありがとう

translation.en: - We should've called first. - It's nothing.
translation.ja: 怒ってる いいのよ

translation.en: And now that you're no longer in the music program,
translation.ja: 音楽プログラムから 抜けたんだし―

translation.en: you can concentrate on classes that matter.
translation.ja: 今後は授業に専念してね

translation.en: You got the e- mail from the school, right?
Yeah.
We're still discussing it.
Bueno. I'm off to Pilates.
translation.ja: それじゃ ピラティスへ行くわ

translation.en: - Mwah! - Oh yeah!
Wa- chow! It's gone.
So, Julie,
translation.ja: 試合の話 聞きたい？

translation.en: wanna hear how I slid into home and was almost safe?
translation.ja: あと少しで得点できたんだ

translation.en: You're a good brother. That's not gonna work.
I tried.
Why didn't you tell me? You made me lie to your aunt.
Sorry. I was gonna tell you after dinner.
translation.ja: 夕食後に言うつもりだった

translation.en: - Yeah. Mm- hmm. - I was.
translation.ja: どうかな 本当だよ

translation.en: Honey, I know those classes can be difficult,
translation.ja: 音楽に関わるのが つらいのは分かるが…

translation.en: but you still like music, don't you?
I don't know. Maybe.
Look, we talked about this, you know? And how painful memories can be, but...
translation.ja: 前にも話したが 思い出に胸が痛むことはある

translation.en: You know, every time I see you and Carlos, I see Mom.
translation.ja: お前たちを見るたびに

translation.en: It's like she's right here with us.
translation.ja: ママの顔が浮かぶんだ

translation.en: But you know what? I love that. I do.
translation.ja: でも それがうれしい

translation.en: And maybe if you'd give yourself a chance,
you'll get there.
translation.ja: お前も そう思える

translation.en: What's that?
I must have left the stereo on in the garage. I'll go get it.
translation.ja: ステレオを消し忘れたみたい

translation.en: Guys! Guys, stop!
translation.ja: ねえ！ いい加減にして

translation.en: Enough! Stop! Cut it out!
translation.ja: いい加減にして やめてってば

translation.en: The whole neighborhood could hear you. I thought I told you to leave.
translation.ja: 演奏が近所に響き渡ってる

translation.en: Wait. People can hear us play?
Yes! And so did my dad and my brother!
translation.ja: そうよ　弟やパパもね

translation.en: W- W- Wait. Wait. So, only you can see us,
but everyone can hear us?
- I mean, what kind of ghosts are we? - Who cares, man? People can hear us play!
translation.ja: どういう幽霊？ 何でもいい 演奏が聞こえるんだ

translation.en: We might be dead, but our music isn't.
translation.ja: 僕らの音楽は死んでない

translation.en: Dad!
Just making sure you're OK.
Yeah, I'm fine. I just had to turn off the CD player.
translation.ja: うん　音楽を消しに来ただけ

translation.en: Wait. Is this the junk that was in the loft?
Junk?
Some of this stuff's in pretty good shape.
Hey, maybe we can make a couple bucks.
What? Yo, stop touching my drums. Tell him to stop touching my drums.
translation.ja: 何だって？　触るなよ やめさせろ

translation.en: I liked that song you had on.
translation.ja: さっきの いい曲だな

translation.en: - Sweet! We're Sunset Curve. - Tell your friends.
translation.ja: サンセット･カーブだ よろしく

translation.en: It's just an old CD I found.
Well, still, it's nice that you're listening to music again.
translation.ja: 音楽に触れるのは いいことだ

translation.en: Out here you can play whatever you want, whenever you want.
translation.ja: ここで思う存分 楽しめばいい

translation.en: That's nice!
Stay out of this.
I- I'm sorry, honey. I didn't...
Oh no, no, no, no. Not you. I mean... Uh... Er...
translation.ja: 違う　パパじゃないの

translation.en: You know, give me a minute.
translation.ja: 少し時間をちょうだい

translation.en: Hey. Hey. Hey. Hey.
translation.ja: ジュリー　焦らなくていい

translation.en: We'll figure out this music program thing.
Thanks, Dad.
- He likes our song. - Oh yeah. He doesn't count.
translation.ja: 曲を褒めてた 気に入られてもな

translation.en: He's a dad.
Why can't you guys just be normal ghosts?
Hang out at an old mansion. I hear Pasadena's nice.
translation.ja: パサデナあたりの 古い屋敷で過ごせば？

translation.en: I think she's warming up to us.
Yeah, I've always wanted to go to Pasadena.
translation.ja: パサデナは行ってみたい

translation.en: Stop that. I'm serious.
Oh, I'm sorry.
What do you want?
I know this is all completely insane, but you do know how rad this is?
translation.ja: 異常な状況なのは分かる でも音楽は届くって すごいと思わない？

translation.en: People... Actual people can hear us play.
translation.ja: でも音楽は届くって すごいと思わない？

translation.en: Yeah, it's just I've just had a really, really awful day.
translation.ja: そうだね 今日は最悪な日だったの もういい？

translation.en: - I gotta go. - Well, I'm sorry you had a bad day,
translation.ja: 今日は最悪な日だったの もういい？ それは気の毒だね

translation.en: but three guys just found out that they had a bad 25 years,
translation.ja: 俺らは最悪な25年を過ごした

translation.en: and then they found out that the one thing they lived for in the first place they can still do.
translation.ja: だけど生きがいだった音楽は 続けられると知った

translation.en: That's pretty rad.
You're right.
- It's just... - Your bad day.
Yeah. I know.
translation.ja: 最悪な日だったんだろ

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry we came into your life,
but...
what I just felt in there actually made me feel alive again.
translation.ja: 演奏して生き返った気がした

translation.en: We all felt alive again.
So, you can kick us out if you want, but we're not giving up music.
translation.ja: 追い出されても 俺らは音楽をやめない

translation.en: We can play again. That's a gift no musician would ever turn down.
translation.ja: こんな幸運を投げ出す ミュージシャンはいないよ

translation.en: You gotta know that. Clearly, your mom is into music.
translation.ja: 分かるはずだ 君のママも音楽を愛してる

translation.en: Was.
She passed away.
I am...  so sorry.
translation.ja: ごめん　そうだったんだ

translation.en: Yeah, we... we didn't know.
It's all right.
You guys haven't seen her anywhere, have you?
translation.ja: ママに会ってないよね？

translation.en: From wherever you're from.
No. No, I mean, you're kind of the first person we've seen.
translation.ja: 死後に会ったのは君だけだよ

translation.en: Yeah, but she's not dead, so it doesn't answer her question.
Yeah. I think she knows what we mean.
I'm sorry for your loss.
Thanks.
Sorry I got mad.
You guys are kinda good.
Kinda?
Y- Y- You know that's like 25 years of rust just getting dusted off.
translation.ja: 25年ぶりだ あれは本調子じゃない

translation.en: - Yeah. Do you play the piano too? - No.
translation.ja: そうだ　君もピアノを？

translation.en: No, I don't play. That was my mom's stuff in there.
translation.ja: 弾かない　あれはママのよ

translation.en: No way. She's an amazing songwriter.
She was.
Wait. How would you know?
There's a song on the piano. If it's hers...
translation.ja: ピアノの上に楽譜があった

translation.en: Your mom was really talented.
I guess...  if you need a place to stay,
translation.ja: 住む場所が必要なら いていいよ

translation.en: you can stay in there.
There's a bathroom in the back
and a couch that turns into a bed if you still use any of that stuff.
translation.ja: 寝るのなら ソファベッドを使って

translation.en: Dibs on the shower!
I just really like showers and sometimes the occasional bath.
translation.ja: シャワーが好きなんだ お風呂も

translation.en: This...
This is just too weird.
What would you say if I told you
translation.ja: “ママのスタジオに 幽霊が―”

translation.en: there are three ghosts living in my mom's studio?
translation.ja: “住んでるって言ったら どう思う？”

translation.en: You'd say I'm crazy.
Hey, I know being dead isn't our first choice,
translation.ja: 死んだのは残念だけど

translation.en: but, I mean, it sure is easy getting around.
translation.ja: 移動はラクで いいね

translation.en: Easy for you, maybe. I lost my shirt on that one.
translation.ja: いいもんか シャツがなくなった

translation.en: Ooh, never mind! There it is.
OK, so,  why'd you bring us here?
translation.ja: なんで ここに 連れてきたわけ？

translation.en: Just another painful reminder of where we never got to play.
translation.ja: 機会を逃したのを痛感するよ

translation.en: - Thanks, Luke. - I mean, boys, the game isn't over yet.
translation.ja: サンキュ まだ終わってない

translation.en: I'm telling you, we've been given a second chance.
translation.ja: ２度目のチャンスを 与えられたんだ

translation.en: Let's find some music. Let's see how many clubs we can hit before sunrise.
translation.ja: 日が昇るまで 音楽を求めて街を回ろう

translation.en: Hey!
Hey, Alex. You coming?
Let's go!
Guys?
Guys?
♪ Here's one thing ♪ ♪ I want you to know ♪
translation.ja: あなたに知って 　　ほしいことがある

translation.en: ♪ You got someplace to go ♪
translation.ja: あなたには 　　行くべき場所がある

translation.en: ♪ Life's a test, yes But you go toe- to- toe ♪
translation.ja: 人生は試練 　　それに向き合うの

translation.en: ♪ You don't give up, no You grow ♪
translation.ja: 諦めないで　成長して

translation.en: ♪ And you use your pain ♪
♪ 'Cause it makes you you ♪
♪ Though I wish I could hold you through it ♪
♪ I know it's not the same ♪ ♪ You got living to do ♪
translation.ja: でも 自分で乗り越えないと

translation.en: ♪ And I just want you to do it ♪
translation.ja: 私は そう願ってる

translation.en: ♪ So get up, get out Relight that spark ♪
translation.ja: 立ち上がって 　　また光をともして

translation.en: ♪ You know the rest by heart ♪
♪ Wake up, wake up If it's all you do ♪
translation.ja: 目を覚まして 　　まずはそこから

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.ja: 目をこらして 　　自分の内側を見つめて

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
♪ It's what you'll gain Raising your voice to the rain ♪
translation.ja: これから得るものが大事 　　　　　　　　雨に叫んで

translation.en: ♪ Wake up your dream and make it true ♪
translation.ja: 夢を夢にせず かなえるの

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.ja: 目をこらして 　　自分の内側を見つめて

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
♪ Relight that spark Time to come out of the dark ♪
translation.ja: 光をともして 　　闇を抜け出すの

translation.en: ♪ Wake up ♪
♪ Wake up ♪
♪ Better wake those demons ♪ ♪ Just look them in the eye ♪
translation.ja: あえて悪魔を目覚めさせ 　　　　　　　目を見つめて

translation.en: ♪ No reason not to try ♪
♪ Life can be a mess ♪
♪ I won't let it cloud my mind ♪
♪ I'll let my fingers fly ♪
♪ And I use the pain ♪
♪ 'Cause it's part of me ♪
♪ And I'm ready to power through it ♪
translation.ja: 道を切り開く準備はできてる

translation.en: ♪ Gonna find the strength ♪
♪ Find the melody ♪
♪ 'Cause you showed me how to do it ♪
translation.ja: あなたが教えてくれた

translation.en: ♪ Get up, get out Relight that spark ♪
translation.ja: 立ち上がって 　　また光をともして

translation.en: ♪ You know the rest by heart ♪
♪ Wake up, wake up If it's all you do ♪
translation.ja: 目を覚まして 　　まずはそこから

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.ja: 目をこらして 　　自分の内側を見つめて

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
♪ It's what you'll gain Raising your voice to the rain ♪
translation.ja: これから得るものが大事 　　　　　　　　雨に叫んで

translation.en: ♪ Wake up your dream and make it true ♪
translation.ja: 夢を夢にせず かなえるの

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.ja: 目をこらして 　　自分の内側を見つめて

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
♪ Relight that spark Time to come out of the dark ♪
translation.ja: 光をともして 　　闇を抜け出すの

translation.en: ♪ Wake up ♪
♪ Wake up ♪
♪ So, wake that spirit, spirit ♪
♪ I wanna hear it, hear it ♪
♪ No need to fear it You're not alone ♪
translation.ja: 恐れる必要はない 　　独りじゃないから

translation.en: ♪ You're gonna find your way ♪
translation.ja: あなたは 　　進むべき道を見つける

translation.en: ♪ Wake up, wake up If it's all you do ♪
translation.ja: 目を覚まして 　　まずはそこから

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.ja: 目をこらして 　　自分の内側を見つめて

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
♪ It's what you'll gain Raising your voice to the rain ♪
translation.ja: これから得るものが大事 　　　　　　　　雨に叫んで

translation.en: ♪ Wake up your dream And make it true ♪
translation.ja: 夢を夢にせず かなえるの

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.ja: 目をこらして 　　自分の内側を見つめて

translation.en: ♪ When you feel lost ♪
♪ Relight that spark Time to come out of the dark ♪
translation.ja: 光をともして 　　闇を抜け出すの

translation.en: ♪ Wake up ♪
♪ Mm- mm, wake up ♪
♪ Now or never ♪
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　佐古 みあ
